name: Explosive Arrow
descricao:
Make a ranged weapon attack, the weapon’s ammunition, or the weapon itself if it’s a thrown weapon, transforms into a bolt of elemental power. Make the attack roll as normal. The target takes 4d8 elemental damage on a hit, or half as much damage on a miss, instead of the weapon’s normal damage.
	Whether you hit or miss, each creature within 10 feet of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. Each of these creatures takes 2d8 elemental damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
	The piece of ammunition or weapon then returns to its normal form.
	**Enhance Spell**. For each 5000 extra mana spent, add 1d8 to both spell effects, up to maximum 3d8 extra dice.
